toleranceExplanation: Lowering this limit decreases your risk of frontrunning. However, this makes more likely that your transaction will fail due to normal price movements.
Liquidity providers earn a 0.3% fee on a: Liquidity providers earn a 0.3% fee on all trades proportional to their share of the pool. Fees are added to the pool, accrue in real time and can be claimed by withdrawing your liquidity.

SlippageInfo: Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage.
TimeoutInfo: Your transaction will revert if it is pending for more than this long.
ExpertTips: Bypasses confirmation modals and allows high slippage trades. Use at your own risk.
ExpertModeInfo: Expert mode turns off the confirm transaction prompt and allows high slippage trades that often result in bad rates and lost funds.
ExpertModeWarn: ONLY USE THIS MODE IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING.
TokenFind: Find a token by searching for its name or symbol or by pasting its address below.
Select a token to find your liquidity.
Connect to a wallet to find pools: Connect to a wallet to find pools
AddLiquidityTips: When you add liquidity, you are given pool tokens representing your position. These tokens automatically earn fees proportional to your share of the pool, and can be redeemed at any time.
RemoveLiquidityTips: Removing pool tokens converts your position back into underlying tokens at the current rate, proportional to your share of the pool. Accrued fees are included in the amounts you receive.
PriceMoveWarn: Your transaction will revert if there is a large, unfavorable price movement before it is confirmed.
PriceImpactTips: The difference between the market price and estimated price due to trade size.
FeeTips: A portion of each trade (0.30%) goes to liquidity providers as a protocol incentive.

InputEstimated: Input is estimated. You will sell at most
